response.overview: On the fifteenth anniversary of the exorcism that claimed Father Damien Karras' life, Police Lieutenant Kinderman's world is once again shattered when a boy is found decapitated and savagely crucified.
response.tagline: Do you dare walk these steps again?
response.title: The Exorcist III
